name: Whisper of the Woods
description:
~

Hi there, we are a small group of five from sunny Northern Ireland, Cliona, Noah, Daniel, Rhys & Jess. Who have teamed up to make a demo prototype together! Our game that's on show here was made in ten days. It's been a fun experience learning new skills and how to work better in a team & we are proud of what we have accomplished & what it can become!

~

We hope you enjoy our game!
